H1_split_answer1: Ah, 'ello there! Well, y'see, I care for a right lot o' magical creatures at Hogwarts. There's th' giant squid in th' Black Lake, a lovely creature, it is. Then there's Buckbeak, a Hippogriff, who’s a bit proud but very noble. I also look after th' Blast-Ended Skrewts, though they can be a handful, I tell y'! And don’t forget th' Thestrals, them invisible horses that can only be seen by those who’ve seen death. Each one’s special in their own way, y'know? It's a grand job, it is!
H1_split_answer2: Ah, 'ello there! The Forbidden Forest, eh? It's a right magical place, it is! Full o' all sorts o' creatures, from thestrals to centaurs, and even a few giant spiders, if yer brave enough to look. It's a bit dark and mysterious, but it's also a home to many wondrous beings. Just gotta be careful, mind ye! Some o' 'em can be a bit temperamental. But I reckon it's a place worth explorin' if yer up for an adventure!
